title: 03/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Dak Prescott signing a record-breaking deal to stay with the Cowboys by giving the positive spin while also revealing the reality of what paying Dak that much money means. He tells you why he's not buying the rumors about Jerry Jones and the reason he decided to overpay for Dak. He also ranks the highest paid quarterbacks in the league right now and where Prescott ranks among them. Plus, he welcomes in Hall of Fame Cowboys head coach Jimmy Johnson to find out what he thinks about the massive contract and if Dallas should be considered a Super Bowl contender.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
